tagline: Django app for making any object featured
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
## Install

* pip install django-featured-objects

## Configuration

```python
    # add to settings.py
    INSTALLED_APPS += ('featured',)
    FEATURABLE_MODELS = (
        ('app_label', 'model_name'), 
        ('app_label', 'another_model_name')
    )
```
## Use

Go to admin site and add objects by id and content type to featured app.

## Contribute

Fork and pull request, will be added to pypi soon.
name: django-featured-objects
